```{r, PSA input}

# creating the test parameter sheet 
  psa_param <- read_excel("PRDTP/Literature/prdtpparameters.xlsx", sheet = "SA_Test") %>% 
  mutate(var = se^2)
    


psa_calc.fxn <- function(distribution, mu, var) {
  mu <- as.numeric(mu)  # Ensure mu is numeric
  var <- as.numeric(var)  # Ensure var is numeric
  
  if (distribution == "beta") {
    alpha <- ((1 - mu) / var - 1 / mu) * mu ^ 2
    beta <- alpha * (1 / mu - 1)
  } 
  
  else if (distribution == "gamma") {
    beta <- var / mu
    alpha <- mu / beta
  }
  
  else if (distribution == "log-normal") {
    se = sqrt(var)
    
    
    beta <- var / mu
    alpha <- mu / beta
  }

  else {
    alpha <- NA
    beta <- NA
  }
  
  return(params = list(alpha = alpha, beta = beta))
}


t <- psa_calc.fxn("beta", 0.311, 0.00311^2)

  rowwise() %>%
  mutate(params = list(psa_calc.fxn(distribution, mu, var))) %>%
  mutate(alpha = params$alpha, beta = params$beta) %>%

  require(truncnorm)
  require(gtools)
  
  p.vegf_less15 <- rbeta(n = n_sim, shape1 = psa_param[["p.H0_AC"]][["S1"]], shape2 = psa_param[["p.H0_AC"]][["S2"]])
  
  p.SYM_AC <- rbeta(n = n_sim,
                    shape1 = psa_param[["p.SYM_AC"]][["S1"]],
                    shape2 = psa_param[["p.SYM_AC"]][["S2"]])
  
  p.H1_AC <- rbeta(n = n_sim,
                    shape1 = psa_param[["p.H1_AC"]][["S1"]],
                    shape2 = psa_param[["p.H1_AC"]][["S2"]])

}
```
